div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 266 Koniska, NE of Thermon, Aetolia, c. 1962 Burial: c. 150-140 B.C. (T) Contents: 16+ AR Aenianes: 1 triob. Phocis: 1 triob. Locri Opuntii: 1 triob. Chalcis: 2 dr. Aegina: 1 dr. Sicyon: 1 dr.; 3 triob. Achaean League: 2 triob. (Dyme, Aegium with ΑΡΙCΤΟ) Aegae: 1 triob. Elis: 1 triob. Ptolemy I: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Athens (coins and casts) Varoucha, A Delt 1964, Chronika, pp. 9-10, illus.
